dependencies.description:
GNU Make is a tool which controls the generation of executables and
other non-source files of a program from the program's source files.
dependencies.name: gmake

dependencies.description:
Perl 5 is a highly capable, feature-rich programming language with over
27 years of development.
dependencies.name: perl

dependent_to.description:
A Unified Release of the FTOOLS and XANADU Software Packages. XANADU:
High-level, multi-mission tasks for X-ray astronomical spectral, timing,
and imaging data analysis. FTOOLS: General and mission-specific tools to
manipulate FITS files. FITSIO: Core library responsible for reading and
writing FITS files. fv: General FITS file browser/editor/plotter with a
graphical user interface. XSTAR: Tool for calculating the physical
conditions and emission spectra of photoionized gases
dependent_to.name: heasoft

dependent_to.description: A SNMP application library, tools and daemon.
dependent_to.name: net-snmp

dependent_to.description: bigint/bigrat/bignum - transparent big number support
dependent_to.name: perl-bignum

dependent_to.description: Carp - alternative warn and die for modules
dependent_to.name: perl-carp

dependent_to.description: Carp::Assert - executable comments.
dependent_to.name: perl-carp-assert

dependent_to.description: A low-Level Interface to bzip2 compression library.
dependent_to.name: perl-compress-raw-bzip2

dependent_to.description: A low-Level Interface to zlib compression library.
dependent_to.name: perl-compress-raw-zlib

dependent_to.description: Parse and validate simple name/value option pairs
dependent_to.name: perl-data-optlist

dependent_to.description:
DB_File is a module which allows Perl programs to make use of the
facilities provided by Berkeley DB version 1.x (if you have a newer
version of DB, see "Using DB_File with Berkeley DB version 2 or
greater"). It is assumed that you have a copy of the Berkeley DB manual
pages at hand when reading this documentation. The interface defined
here mirrors the Berkeley DB interface closely.
dependent_to.name: perl-db-file

dependent_to.description:
Digest::MD5::File - Perl extension for getting MD5 sums for files and
urls.
dependent_to.name: perl-digest-md5-file

dependent_to.description:
File::Find::Rule is a friendlier interface to File::Find. It allows you
to build rules which specify the desired files and directories.
dependent_to.name: perl-file-find-rule

dependent_to.description:
File::Grep - Find matches to a pattern in a series of files and related
functions
dependent_to.name: perl-file-grep

dependent_to.description: Interface to Gd Graphics Library
dependent_to.name: perl-gd

dependent_to.description: Number::Compare - numeric comparisons
dependent_to.name: perl-number-compare

dependent_to.description: Parse::Yapp - Perl extension for generating and using LALR parsers.
dependent_to.name: perl-parse-yapp

dependent_to.description:
Set::IntervalTree uses Interval Trees to store and efficiently look up
ranges using a range-based lookup.
dependent_to.name: perl-set-intervaltree

dependent_to.description: Template - Front-end module to the Template Toolkit.
dependent_to.name: perl-template-toolkit

dependent_to.description:
Text::Glob implements glob(3) style matching that can be used to match
against text rather than fetching names from a filesystem.
dependent_to.name: perl-text-glob

dependent_to.description: Interface to Tk Graphics Library
dependent_to.name: perl-tk

dependent_to.description: RA tool for data logging and analysis.
dependent_to.name: rrdtool

description:
ExtUtils::MakeMaker - Create a module Makefile. This utility is designed
to write a Makefile for an extension module from a Makefile.PL. It is
based on the Makefile.SH model provided by Andy Dougherty and the
perl5-porters.
name: perl-extutils-makemaker

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
variants.name: build_system
